opacity.name: Image Opacity %:
opacity.hint: Value between 0 and 100, lower means more translucent. Default: 50%

width.name: Image Width:
width.hint: Width of the icon in pixels. Default: 100px

height.name: Image Height:
height.hint: Height of the icon in pixels. Default: 100px

initRotation.name: Image Rotation:
initRotation.hint: This sets the initial rotation of the image. Can be used to rotate the image, if the rotation animation is disabled. Default: 0

speed.name: Speed:
speed.hint: Seconds per rotation, 0 is no rotation. Default: 5

verticalPos.name: Vertical Position:
verticalPos.hint: Vertical position of the Pause Element on screen. 0 is extreme top, 100 extreme bottom. Default: 50

horizontalPos.name: Horizontal Position:
horizontalPos.hint: Horizontal position of the Pause Element on screen. 0 is extreme left, 100 extreme right. Works best with gradient background off. Default: 50

gradientBackground.name: Gradient Background:
gradientBackground.hint: Toggles the background behind the icon and the message.

gradientColor.name: Gradient Color:
gradientColor.hint: Sets the color of the gradient. Default: #0b0a13

gradientOpacity.name: Gradient Opacity
gradientOpacity.hint: Sets the background opacity of the center of the gradient. Default: 128

messages.name: Pause Messages:
messages.hint: After saving your settings, REPAUSE the game to see your changes, you've made!
messages.label: Pause Messages
messages.messageHint: You can use \n to insert newlines into your messages!

textSync.name: Enable Synchronization:
textSync.hint: Enable or disable synchronization of the pause text between players.

changeInterval.name: Change Text Interval:
changeInterval.hint: Seconds until the next random text is displayed. 0 and negative values disables this. Default: 15s

fontFamily.name: Font:
fontFamily.hint: Font name to be used. It works well with Custom Fonts module and Google Fonts. Check the name is well written. Foundry Default: Amiri

useGoogleFont.name: Google Font:
useGoogleFont.hint: Check this, if the font is from Google Fonts, otherwise it will not work. Default: false

fontColor.name: Font Color:
fontColor.hint: Color Hexcode of the font. Default: #ada7b8

fontSize.name: Font Size (em):
fontSize.hint: Size of the font in em. Default: 2em

fontBold.name: Bold:
fontBold.hint: Bolds the font. Some fonts don't support this. Default: true

fontItalic.name: Italic:
fontItalic.hint: Italicizes the font. Some fonts don't support this. Default: false

fontSmallCaps.name: Small Caps:
fontSmallCaps.hint: Activates the small-caps font variant. All lowercase letters are converted to smaller uppercase letters. Default: false

lineHeight.name: Line Height (rem):
lineHeight.hint: Height of text lines in rem, best for multiline text is 2. Default: 1rem

lineOffset.name: Vertical Line Offset (px):
lineOffset.hint: Offset of the message line in relation to the image. Negative values offset upwards, positive values downwards. Works best with background off. Default: 0px

textShadow.name: Enable Drop Shadow:
textShadow.hint: When enabled there is a drop shadow under the text.

textAlign.name: Align Multiline Text:
textAlign.hint: Align multiline text inside it's display box. Default: Center

fontCaps.name: Text options:
fontCaps.hint: Sets diverse options to transform the text. Default: All uppercase

animationType.name: Animation Type:
animationType.hint: Sets the animation for the whole Pause Element. Default: Pulse

animationDuration.name: Animation Duration:
animationDuration.hint: Sets the duration of the animation in seconds. Default: 3s

animationColor.name: Animation Color:
animationColor.hint: On some of the animations the color can be changed. Default: #ffffff
